default.background: absolute -z-10 bottom-0 left-0 right-0 top-0 bg-[linear-gradient(to_right,#4f4f4f2e_1px,transparent_1px),linear-gradient(to_bottom,#4f4f4f2e_1px,transparent_1px)] bg-[size:14px_24px] [mask-image:radial-gradient(ellipse_80%_50%_at_50%_0%,#000_70%,transparent_110%)]
default.super: flex flex-col gap-2 items-center bg-white dark:bg-slate-950 text-black dark:text-white w-full

header.self: flex flex-col justify-end items-center px-4 py-2 border-gray-200 max-h-[250px] min-h-[250px]
header.name: font-bold text-2xl

cont.self: flex flex-col justify-between gap-6 max-w-[600px] w-full min-h-[calc(100dvh-250px)] p-4

links.card: text-lg text-center font-semibold bg-gray-600/20 hover:bg-gray-600/40 hover:scale-105 transition rounded-lg w-4/5
links.link: flex w-full justify-center items-center gap-2 p-4

footer.self: flex items-center gap-2 p-4 bg-gray-700/20 my-2 rounded-lg

default2.super: flex flex-col gap-2 items-center bg-white dark:bg-black text-black dark:text-white w-full
